purpleculture_pinyin:
yù
to praise; to acclaim; reputation
хвалить; приветствовать; репутация
rtega_mnemonic:
譽譽RS
誉誉		fame, reputation, praise, honour, glory
  • speak 言 to give 與 praise to someone
  • ⓢ speak 言 about rising 兴 fame
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 誉)
Antonyms: 毀
Pictophonetic: 與 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 譽為 [ yù wéi ]: to acclaim as
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 與 [ yǔ ] and; with; to; for; to give, to grant
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
heisig_chinese_memo: If you offer a new invention to society by announcing it with your words, your reputation will shoot up.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This owl's reputation skyrocketed after he created a tool in order to speak human words.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " words " and " sounds ", the original meaning is praise and praise. "Shuowen": "[言爯] also. From words to voices." "The Analects of Confucius-Wei Linggong": "I am a man, who will destroy his reputation? If you have a reputation, you have to try ."

" Fitch " also refers to the reputation, reputation. "Mencius·Gaozishang": "Ling Wen is widely praised on the body, so I don't want people to embroider them."
humanum_short_description_en: From " words " and " sounds ", the original meaning is praise and praise.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，與「聲」，本義為稱贊、贊美。《說文》：「[言爯]也。从言，與聲。」 《論語‧衛靈公》：「吾之於人也，誰毀誰譽？如有所譽者，其有所試矣。」

　　「譽」也指名譽、聲譽。《孟子‧告子上》：「令聞廣譽施於身，所以不願人之文繡也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，與「聲」，本義為稱贊、贊美。

Chinese: If you offer a new invention to society by announcing it with your words, your reputation will shoot up.
Meaning: reputation
Hanzi: 誉
Story: This owl's reputation skyrocketed after he created a tool in order to speak human words.
Kind: traditional

從「 言 」，與「 聲 」，本義為稱贊、贊美。《說文》：「[言爯]也。从言，與聲。」 《論語‧衛靈公》：「吾之於人也，誰毀誰譽？如有所譽者，其有所試矣。」 「 譽 」也指名譽、聲譽。《孟子‧告子上》：「令聞廣譽施於身，所以不願人之文繡也。」
From " words" and " sounds", the original meaning is praise and praise. "Shuowen": "[言爯] also. From words to voices." "The Analects of Confucius-Wei Linggong": "I am a man, who will destroy his reputation? If you have a reputation, you have to try ." " Fitch" also refers to the reputation, reputation. "Mencius·Gaozishang": "Ling Wen is widely praised on the body, so I don't want people to embroider them."

譽字的基本解释

譽
yù
见“誉”。

譽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》羊洳切，去御，以。］
［《廣韻》以諸切，平魚，以。］
“誉1”的繁体字。“輿2”的被通假字。
(1)称赞；赞美。
(2)名誉；声誉。
(3)通“豫”。欢愉；安乐。
(4)通“豫”。犹疑。参见“譽譽”。
(5)通“與”。党与；同类。
(6)通“與”。犹接触，晤对。
(7)姓。晋有誉粹。

譽字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譽； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1185第07
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?羊茹切，余去聲。【說文】稱也。【玉篇】聲美也。【易·坤卦】括囊无咎无譽。【註】譽者，過美之名。【詩·周頌】以永終譽。【箋】聲美也。【禮·表記】君子不以口譽人，則民作忠。【莊子·盜跖篇】好面譽人者，亦好背而毀之。　又【禮·祭統孔疏】援神契云：大夫之孝曰譽。　又星名。【晉書·天文志】瑞星，三曰含譽。　又姓。平原大守譽粹。見【晉書】。　又【諡法】狀古述今曰譽。　又通作豫。【詩·小雅】是以有譽處兮。【傳】譽，善聲也。處，安樂也。蘇氏曰：譽、豫通。凡詩之譽，皆言樂也。　又【韻會小補】通作與。【禮·射義】詩曰：則燕則譽。【鄭註】譽，或爲與。　又【廣韻】以諸切【集韻】【韻會】羊諸切，?音余。義同。【論語】誰毀誰譽。【朱傳】譽者，揚人之善，而過其實。譽平聲。又【詩·大雅】慶旣令居，韓姞燕譽。【傳】燕，安。譽，樂也。

譽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
譽字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
reputation
yù
See "honour".
reputation
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" sheep cut, go to imperial, take. ]
["Guangyun" is based on all cuts, flat fish, with. ]
The traditional characters of "誉1". "Yu 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Praise; praise.
(2) Reputation; reputation.
(3) Through "Yu". Joy; happiness.
(4) Through "Yu". Hesitate. See "Yuyu".
(5) Through "and". Party and; the same kind.
(6) Through "and". Still touching, meeting right.
(7) Last name. Jin has a reputation.
reputation
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 Yu; Kangxi strokes: 21; Pages: 1185 to 07
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Sheep Ru cut, I went to sound. [Said Wen] Said also. [Jade articles] Sound and beauty. [Easy·Kun Gua] It has no blame and no reputation. [Note] Those who are honoured have the name of being beautiful. 【Poetry·Zhou Song】In order to endure forever. [J] Shengmei also. 【Ritual·Table Record】A gentleman does not praise others by his mouth, and the people shall be loyal. 【Zhuangzi·Pirates the Plant】A person who has a good face and a reputation can also be ruined by the back.　[Ritual·Memorial Confucian Confucianism] Helping God Qiyun: The doctor's filial piety is the reputation.　Also star name. 【Book of Jin·Astronomy】Rising, the third name means fame.　Another last name. Pingyuan dashou's reputation. See [Book of Jin].　 Also 【Posthumous Law】Presenting the ancients and presenting the present is called fame.　Tong Zuo Yu again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Being well-known. [Biography] Reputation, good voice. Place, peace and happiness. Su said: Yu, Yutong. The reputation of all poems is full of joy.　[Rhyme will be a small supplement] through the same. 【Rite·Shooting Righteousness】The poem says: If you swallow, you will be honored. [Zheng's Note] Honor, or for and.　 [Guang Yun] Zhu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Sheep Zhu Qi,? Yin Yu. The same meaning. [The Analects] Who destroys the reputation. [Zhu Chuan] The honourable person, promotes the good of others, and is exaggerated. Yu Pingsheng. Also 【Poetry·Daya】Qingchang Lingju, Han Yuyan Yu. [Biography] Yan, Ann. Fame, music also.
